comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/45179809@N00]  mtlicq -- The M*A*S*H actor is Jamie Farr. No relation, different spelling and pronunciation.

comment.author: 45179809@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/antonia13/] Thank you for the music ♫ ♪ !  I enjoyed that, she was a great singer with a wonderful voice.  

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/Infrogmation/]  I know.  Pardon my sense of humour, I know its not Jamie Farr, its just that the name is close and Jamie Farr tried to look like this so he could get out of the Korean War safely.  Beware, War sucks.  Peace and goodwill to all.
